籤詩版本二:
Thaum cua ntsawj teeb taws tswm ciab thiab sparse ntxoov ntxoo nyob rau hauv lub ntuj, lawv ua zoo li paj nyob rau hauv daim iav nyob rau hauv ib tug trance.
Kuv nkees nkees thiab thov kom cov menyuam saib xyuas kuv, ua li cas kuv thiaj paub tias nws tsuas yog kev dag ntxias xwb?
詩意:
Qhov no hexagram zoo li cua teeb taws tswm ciab.
Lub koob npe cuav yog kev puas tsuaj rau txhua yam.
解曰: Kev nplua nuj nyob saum ntuj. Kev txom nyem yog txoj hmoo. Tsis tas yuav nrhiav tswv yim. Txhua yam yog predestined.
籤詩故事一:
◇Kong Ming Lub Sixth Journey tawm ntawm Qishan
Lub sijhawm peb lub Nceeg Vaj, Qishan Roob tau khiav hla Wei thiab Shu, Kong Ming rov mus rau Qishan Roob los tua Wei tab sis ua tsis tiav.
Lub sijhawm thib rau nws tawm mus rau Qishan, Kong Ming tau sau nws cov lus qhia, tab sis nws tsis tuaj yeem yeej thaum kawg. Thaum kawg, Zhuge Liang tuag vim muaj mob hauv Wuzhangyuan thaum muaj hnub nyoog 54 xyoos vim ua haujlwm dhau.
( Zaj dab neeg no yog ib qho piv txwv rau "kev txawj ntse tsis sib npaug ntawm karma")
聖意: Thov Vajtswv rau koj lub tsev, ceev faj, nrhiav kev nplua nuj thiab tau txais txiaj ntsig, ceev faj hauv kev ua lag luam, ceev faj txog koj txoj kev sib yuav, ceev faj txog koj txoj kev sib yuav, muaj kev nyab xeeb, muaj kev nyab xeeb, muaj kev nyab xeeb, muaj neeg, plam kab laum, puas, poob tsiaj , yuav ploj mus, ploj lawm, kev foob pej xeem, poob nyiaj, raug neeg tsiv teb tsaws chaw, khaws cia, poob khoom, muaj mob, mob, ua txhaum ntawm kev hloov pauv loj hauv Yinshan,
古人: Kongming's Sixth Journey tawm ntawm Qishan
